muzzle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the nose and mouth of an animal, especially a dog or horse
muzzle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a cover that you put over a dog’s mouth to stop it from biting people
muzzle.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the open end of a gun, where the bullets come out
muzzle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to prevent someone from saying what they think in public
muzzle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: an attempt by the government to muzzle the country’s media
muzzle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to put a muzzle over a dog’s mouth so that it cannot bite people
